constellations.description: Used as an indicator for the south.
Marks the entry of the northwest monsoon season.
Marks the entry of the northwest monsoon season, like the Shark.
Used as an indicator of the entry of the cool season (between the two monsoons) and the emergence of the bambang fish.
Used as a mark towards the east from the Pleiades (Bittoéng Malunus).
Used as an indicator for the south, like the Slanted House. It is not clear whether the stars should be linked by a line or not.

NAME Pleiades.description: Used as a sign of increasing number of flying fish in the Makassar Strait during the southeast monsoon season.

NAME Milky Way.description: Used by fishermen to find a good fishing location without strong winds.

NAME Venus.description: Used as a sign that the Sun will rise about an hour later.
Used by mountain people as a mark that pigs will come out looking for food.
